backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles with role-based access control and a contact form system restricted to admins for viewing, indexing, and deleting submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented site features to corresponding source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing layout components, pages, design tokens, data sources, hooks, and authentication utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, themes, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all site pages and renders them through the SiteLayout root component.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: React component that restricts access to admin-only routes based on authentication and role, showing gated UI states accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading states and query cache clearing.
Simple component rendering the construction company's generated logo image.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: A contact form component with client-side validation and submission via a custom hook, showing success and error states.
frontend/src/components/design/BrandToke: Defines static brand constants including company info, contact details, and business hours.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer layout displaying brand info, navigation links, contact details, business hours, and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive site header with desktop and mobile navigation using router state to highlight active links.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageSecti: Wrapper component that renders a padded page section with optional IDs and container classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout component composing header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Card component showing a project's image, category, location, year, and summary, clickable for details.
Modal displaying full project details including images, metadata, and long description.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines the Project interface and a list of static project entries with metadata and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Hooks for fetching all contact submissions and checking the caller's user role using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Hook that sets and restores the document title on mount and unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
Defines a React Query mutation that submits contact form data through an actor and refreshes submission queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company history, mission, vision, and values using styled sections and cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Admin page that lists and manages contact inquiries with selection support. Uses route guarding, fetches submissions, and displays loading, error, or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CompliancePage.tsx: Displays compliance information, licenses, and certifications using structured card layouts and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact information and a contact form, using cards to display address, phone, email, and business hours.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, government approval highlights, and navigation links to other site areas.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Renders a projects listing page with cards and opens a detail modal when a project is selected. Manages modal state and sets the document title.
frontend/src/pages/SafetyQualityPage.tsx: Displays detailed safety and quality information using sections and UI cards. Sets the page title and presents structured content with icons.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of service offerings with icons and descriptions and includes an additional section explaining the company’s approach. Sets the document title and maps service data into cards.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters with support for hash routing. Includes utilities for persisting parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, shadows, fonts, animations, and plugins. Defines content paths and site-wide styling tokens.
project_state.json: Defines project state for a government‑approved construction company website, including required images, planned features, and schema/version metadata.
